Changelog
=========

1.1
---

* Add hachoir to us as a fallback parser for things hexagonit's parser can't handle.  hachoir isn't as forgiving as hexagonit for SWF, so keep it in reserve.  Enables FLV support.
  [MatthewWilkes]

* Various bugfixes
  [MatthewWilkes]

1.0
---

* Initial version, includes portal transform and SWF metadata support.
  [MatthewWilkes]
